      • run

        public void run()
        Listens for new AH and agent connections. Creates a new thread for each and opens a bank account;
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • getJsonAHConnectionsInfo

        protected java.util.Vector<org.json.simple.JSONObject> getJsonAHConnectionsInfo()
        Acquires connection info for auction houses currently connected to the bank.
        Returns:
        Vector of Json Objects containing port and IP information for each auction house.

                         int AHID,
                         long amount)
        Transfers blocked funds from one agent bank account to an Auction House account.
        Parameters:

        AHID - Auction House ID
        amount - Amount to transfer
        Returns:

        public int blockFunds​(int accountID,
                      long amount)
        Attempts to block specified funds in specified agent account
        Parameters:
        accountID - Agent's Bank Account ID
        amount - Amount to block
        Returns:
        (1) successful (-1) not enough funds

        Returns:
